programme.title: Pro Boxing Archive Series
programme.desc: Lennox Lewis vs Frank Bruno, billed as The Battle of Britain, was a WBC Heavyweight Title fight between Lennox The Lion Lewis (23-0, 19 KOs) and Frank True Brit Bruno (36-3 35 KOs) on October 1st, 1993 at the Cardif Arms Park in Wales, United Kingdom.
